BattlePlatform - Class in br.edu.ifsp.lp2.shadowstruggles.model
A BattlePlatform object storages all the information regarding a battle: the players' decks, the map and the cards placed on it, the rules being applied etc.

br.edu.ifsp.lp2.shadowstruggles - package br.edu.ifsp.lp2.shadowstruggles
The core classes of the application, such as the desktop starter, the controller and the player profile.
br.edu.ifsp.lp2.shadowstruggles.data - package br.edu.ifsp.lp2.shadowstruggles.data
The data access layer, responsible for the communication with external means of storage.
br.edu.ifsp.lp2.shadowstruggles.games - package br.edu.ifsp.lp2.shadowstruggles.games
Classes representing each battle of the game.
br.edu.ifsp.lp2.shadowstruggles.model - package br.edu.ifsp.lp2.shadowstruggles.model
The game's logic layer, responsible for the core functionalities without concern for the data itself.
br.edu.ifsp.lp2.shadowstruggles.model.enemies - package br.edu.ifsp.lp2.shadowstruggles.model.enemies
A package with the enemy logic of each match.
br.edu.ifsp.lp2.shadowstruggles.object2d - package br.edu.ifsp.lp2.shadowstruggles.object2d
This package contains the visual components of the game, including cards, energy/life bars and the map, for example.
br.edu.ifsp.lp2.shadowstruggles.screens - package br.edu.ifsp.lp2.shadowstruggles.screens
The visual layer (interfaces).
br.edu.ifsp.lp2.shadowstruggles.screens.utils - package br.edu.ifsp.lp2.shadowstruggles.screens.utils
Auxiliary classes for the interfaces.
br.edu.ifsp.lp2.shadowstruggles.scripts - package br.edu.ifsp.lp2.shadowstruggles.scripts
The scripts are classes which specify the behavior of cards in battles.
